TopicTitle: sabre engines and hpersonic parts for b9 aerospace

Articles.Content: i recently downloaded the B9 aerospace pack and when i put the Sabre engines on, the don't show up in the staging can someone please tell how to fix this or did i get the wrong pack. as for the hyper sonic cockpit, there is no fuselages that go with it, can someone tell me if i am looking in the wrong places. thanks
B9 is curently broken but there is a comunity patch. Google for it. As for the cockpit i belive it fits to the s2 fuseladge quite nicely.
